attributes.action: Stop the planned opening of a probation service office in a residential area namely Mackadown Rd/Meadway Kitts Green Birmingham
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The opening of a probation service office in the centre of a residential area which includes 3 primary schools is preposterous. We the undersigned do not wish to live in fear of the junkies and paedophiles that will now inundate the area!
